Android will let ‘experienced users’ sideload unverified apps as Google makes case for verification - 9to5Google
tech_news.description: In August, Google announced that it will require developer verification to install Android apps, including through sideloading. That’s continuing, but Google is working on a solution for “experienced users.”

tech_news.title: Here’s how to photograph the northern lights lighting up St. Louis skies this week - STLPR
tech_news.description: Are you chasing the northern lights in Missouri and Illinois? St. Louis Public Radio Visuals Editor Brian Munoz shares how to spot the rare show — and document it on your phone or camera while it lasts.

tech_news.title: Elon Musk’s X botched its security key switchover, locking users out - TechCrunch
tech_news.description: As part of an effort to retire the old Twitter.com domain, X is requiring passkey and security key users to re-enroll — but are getting stuck in endless loops and unable to finish.
